#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
const ll INF = 1e18;
const int N = 4e5 + 10;
ll a[N], b[N];
ll d, step, change, time;
int n;
int main() {
	int T;
	scanf("%d", &T);
	while(T--) {
		scanf("%d", &n);
		for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
			scanf("%lld", &a[i]);
		for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
			scanf("%lld", &b[i]);
		scanf("%lld", &d);

		ll MIN = INF, MINi = 1;
		for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
			change = a[i] - b[i];
			step = d - a[i];
			if(step < 0) {
				time = d;
			}else if(step % change == 0) {
				time = step / change * (a[i] + b[i]) + a[i];
			}else {
				time = d / change * (a[i] + b[i]) + d % change;
			}
			if(time < MIN) {
				MIN = time;
				MINi = i;
			}
		}
		printf("%lld\n", MINi);
	}
	return 0;
}
